MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA19 postcode area of Gourock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.55pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a confirmed underground cable fault located at Drumshantie substation  and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:47PM on Friday 08 January 2021.
